Author: Rivka90
Text: Hey man, I know the weight fluctuations are insane and I feel you on this. After a week of binging, I am down 5 lbs in one day. I am saying this because you do deserve to eat, and it won't make you fat. I hope you enjoyed  your food. I hope we both find peace.
